solution_line_template: Jezebel needs to buy {num_dozens_roses} x {roses_per_dozen} = <<{num_dozens_roses}*{roses_per_dozen}={total_red_roses}>>{total_red_roses} red roses.
Twenty-four red roses will cost {total_red_roses} x ${cost_per_red_rose} = $<<{total_red_roses}*{cost_per_red_rose}={cost_red_roses}>>{cost_red_roses}.
Thus, Jezebel will pay ${cost_red_roses} + ${cost_sunflowers} = $<<{cost_red_roses}+{cost_sunflowers}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} for all those flowers.
